comment._content: Morris McDonald (1865-?), railroad executive, president of the Boston & Maine Railroad 1913-14.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: 1913 date is visible in reverse on the negative.

comment.author: 33593953@N02
comment._content: Thanks for the information. It looks as if the date might even be "7/17/13," the date he was in the news upon his election to be president of the Boston & Maine Railroad (New York Times Archives: query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9E0CE5DD163DE633A.... We'll add some information to the description when we update this record.

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: I started a Wikipedia entry for him: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Morris_McDonald
